title: Losing connection randomly in game
body: This happens randomly and I disconnect from the game permanently. I do not have the option to reconnect, the screen simply freezes and says, "Attempting to reconnect." This is very frustrating as it costs me games and time. I can assure its not my internet as I am posting this as I am "attempting to reconnect." This is very infuriating, please fix this riot.

replies.body: The random nature of these disconnects might suggest an unstable connection, which is having trouble getting to the game server.  I know this is frustrating, so I recommend sticking to custom games to troubleshoot for now.  Run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help rule out some possibilities while strengthening your connection to us.  Let me know if that helps.

I think the problem is with your connection, its a good idea to seek help at Riots support. But if i were you i would open CMD and try "ping www.google.com -t" without qoutes and then after a few minute hit CTRL + C and check how much connection time out you have.(but seek help from riots support, they will assist you better)
